definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
ridge between fields/row of crops/grave mound
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: The Anti-monopoly Authority shall maintain the confidentiality of the person making such report.
sentences.chinese: 反垄断执法机构应当为举报人保密。

sentences.english: In 1998 the Department of Justice launched an anti-trust case against Microsoft.
sentences.chinese: 1998年司法部门以反垄断之名起诉微软。

sentences.english: Based on this theory, many countries carried out anti-monopoly reform and legal regulation on the electricity industry.
sentences.chinese: 这正是各国电力行业改革与反垄断法律规制的依据。

sentences.english: More and more countries realize the importance of international anti - monopoly law.
sentences.chinese: 越来越多的国家认识到国际反垄断的重要性。

sentences.english: V. How can Anti-monopoly Law Regulate the Court of Law for Abuse of Power?
sentences.chinese: 反垄断法如何规制法院权力滥用？

sentences.english: At present, our country has not an intact and unified antimonopoly law.
sentences.chinese: 在当前，我国没有一部完整统一的反垄断法出台。

sentences.english: There are both conflicts and coherence between the two laws.
sentences.chinese: 反垄断法和价格法之间既存在着冲突也存在协调关系。

sentences.english: This is in response to China's probes on monopolistic behaviour in the car industry.
sentences.chinese: 宝马公司此举是对于中国反垄断调查事件的回应。

sentences.english: National monopoly is one of the regulated objects of international anti-monopoly law.
sentences.chinese: 国家垄断是国际反垄断法的重要调整对象之一。

sentences.english: China’s antitrust law took effect in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 中国反垄断法于2008年正式生效。

sentences.english: Anti-monopoly act is mainly related to competition and monopoly.
sentences.chinese: 反垄断法是关于竞争与垄断及其相互关系的法律规范。

sentences.english: Liu said the ministry's antitrust office hasn't been staffed yet.
sentences.chinese: 刘程表示，商务部的反垄断部门尚未组建。

sentences.english: The move is designed to avert legal action by the European Union for violating its anti-monopoly rules.
sentences.chinese: 此举是为了避免欧盟对其违犯反垄断法采取法律行动。

sentences.english: And the Anti-Trust Law should aim to Microsoft at first.
sentences.chinese: 而且反垄断法应该首先针对微软。

sentences.english: It even thought a new anti-monopoly law in China would work in its favor.
sentences.chinese: 即便是在中国新的反垄断法下面看，也是对它有利的。

sentences.english: Chapter 4 discusses the examining system of FIMA.
sentences.chinese: 第四章系统论述外资并购的反垄断审查制度。

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

definition: Supreme Court of the United States
pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Zui4 gao1 Fa3 yuan4

definition: merger and acquisition (M and A)/acquisition/to take over
